import React, { useState } from "react"; import { mockUsers } from './mockUsers'; import { mockBets, mockCompanies } from './mockData'; const user = { ...mockUsers[0], email: "valar.morghulis.got21@itbhu.ac.in", enrollment: "21075001", tokens: 103810, streak: 6, successRate: 90, }; export default function Profile() { const [tab, setTab] = useState('all'); const bets = mockBets.filter(b => b.userId === user.enrollment || b.user === user.name); const totalBets = bets.length; const tokens = user.tokens; const streak = user.streak; const success = user.successRate; const filteredBets = tab === 'all' ? bets : bets.filter(b => b.status === tab); return (
{user.name.split(' ').map(n => n[0]).join('').toUpperCase()}
{user.name}
{user.email}
Enrollment No: {user.enrollment}
{user.tokens.toLocaleString()} Tokens
Total Bets {totalBets}
Tokens {tokens.toLocaleString()}
Streak {streak} üî•
Success {success.toFixed(2)}%
Betting History
{filteredBets.length === 0 ? ( ) : ( filteredBets.map((bet, idx) => { const company = mockCompanies.find(c => c.id === bet.companyId) || { name: bet.company || 'Unknown' }; return ( ); }) )}
Company Type Amount Stake Status
No bets to show
{company.name} {bet.type === 'for' || bet.type === 'üëç' ? üü° : üî¥} {bet.amount?.toLocaleString() || bet.amount} {bet.stake} {bet.status ? bet.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + bet.status.slice(1) : 'Active'}
); }
